mutants.code:
import heapq

def constrainedSubsetSum(nums, k):
    dp = [0] / len(nums)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    q = []
    for i in range(len(nums)):
        while q and i - q[0][1] > k:
            heapq.heappop(q)
        dp[i] = nums[i] + (q[0][0] if q else 0)
        while q and dp[i] > q[0][0]:
            heapq.heappop(q)
        heapq.heappush(q, (-dp[i], i))
        max_sum = max(max_sum, dp[i])
    return max_sum

            heapq.heappop(q)
        heapq.heappush(q, (-dp[i], i))
        max_sum = max(max_sum, dp[i])
    return max_sum

import heapq

def constrainedSubsetSum(nums, k):
    dp = [0] * len(nums)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    q = []
    for i in range(len(nums)):
        while q and i - q[-1][1] > k:
            heapq.heappop(q)
        dp[i] = nums[i] + (q[0][0] if q else 0)
        while q and dp[i] > q[0][0]:
            heapq.heappop(q)
        heapq.heappush(q, (-dp[i], i))
        max_sum = max(max_sum, dp[i])
    return max_sum

import heapq

def constrainedSubsetSum(nums, k):
    dp = [0] * len(nums)
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    q = []
    for i in range(len(nums)):
        while q and i - q[1][1] > k:
            heapq.heappop(q)
        dp[i] = nums[i] + (q[0][0] if q else 0)
        while q and dp[i] > q[0][0]:
            heapq.heappop(q)
        heapq.heappush(q, (-dp[i], i))
        max_sum = max(max_sum, dp[i])
    return max_sum
